titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to limit the imposition of civil money penalties for violations of marketing allotments for sugar and crystalline fructose to those violations that are knowingly committed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1858-1859)

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to limit civil money penalties for violations of marketing allotments for sugar and crystalline fructose to those violations that are knowingly committed.
